text: We may have come full circle to the aughts when it comes to fashion trends, but one reunion that won't be happening anytime soon is between Paris Hilton and Lindsay Lohan. One month after Hilton revealed that Lohan will not be invited to her upcoming wedding with Chris Zylka, explaining ` ` If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all,'' Hilton has become more specific about her issues with Lohan. The heiress called the actress a ` ` pathological liar'' on Instagram after the fan account @ paris2000s posted a few old videos of Lohan talking about their relationship.
